Insanity: Whenever a character you control becomes stunned, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a character card. Put that card into play and remove the rest from the game.
"You call that a formation?"

name: Mr. Zsasz, Scar Tissue
effect:
Reservist

Mr. Zsasz gets -1 / -1 for each character adjacent to him.
Victor Zsasz found purpose in life by liberating his victims from their pointless existences.

name: Natasha Irons as Starlight, Everyman Project
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Natasha Irons becomes stunned, target Revenge Squad character in your front row gets +3 ATK this turn.
"Don't fight me, Uncle John!"

name: Natasha Irons as Steel, Unlikely Alloy
effect: Invulnerability
"If the legacy of Steel is to go on, you must be the one to carry it, Natasha."

name: Never-Ending Battle
effect:
Play only if you control a Revenge Squad character.

Ongoing: Discard a plot twist card >>> Target attacker or defender gets -2 DEF this attack.
"Mankind doesn't need an alien to protect it."

name: Nine Lives
effect:
To play, discard a Gotham Knights character card.

Look at target face-down resource an opponent controls. If it's a non-ongoing plot twist, you may turn it face up.

name: Obey or Die!
effect:
To play, stun a Revenge Squad character you control.

Insanity: Stun all characters with cost 2 or less.
"We are the sons of true royalty—a Lord, a King, and a Queen."

name: Optitron Corporation
effect: Free >>> Ready target Outsiders team attacker you control with cost 3 or less. Use only once per turn.
Batman bankrolled the Outsiders through Optitron Corporation.

name: Outburst, Supermen of America
effect: Activate >>> Target character loses and can't have flight this turn.
Time to put away the toys.

name: Owen Mercer as Captain Boomerang Jr., Prodigal Son
effect: Whenever an Outsiders character you control becomes stunned during the combat phase, you may return it to its owner's hand.
Everyone deserves a second chance.

name: Pequod, Unique
effect:
Outsiders characters you control have flight and range.

Whenever equipped character becomes stunned, you may return Pequod to its owner's hand.

name: Phantom Zone
effect:
Flip only if you control a Revenge Squad or Team Superman character.

Activate >>> Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game.

Replace Phantom Zone >>> Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game.

name: Pick a Card
effect:
To play, exhaust an Arkham Inmates character you control.

Insanity: Search your deck for two cards and reveal one. Your opponent chooses one. Shuffle that card into your deck and put the other into your hand.
"The Joker's wild!"

name: Poison Ivy, Venomous Vixen
effect:
Reservist

Characters adjacent to Poison Ivy get -1 / -1.
An intoxicating rose, complete with thorns.

name: Power Armor
effect: Equipped character gets +2 ATK and can attack as though it had flight.
"These will level the playing field."

name: Power Girl as Nightwing, Kandorian Vigilante
effect: Team Superman characters you control get +2 DEF during your first attack and defense each turn.
Every city needs heroes.

name: Preus, Citizen's Patrol
effect: While all characters you control are in your front row, Preus gets +1 ATK for each ongoing plot twist you control.
"I will burn the impurity from you."

name: Professor Emil Hamilton as Ruin, Power Suit
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Professor Emil Hamilton becomes stunned, you may KO a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for an ongoing plot twist card, reveal it, and put it face down into your resource row.
"You ruined me, Superman. Now I'll ruin you."

name: Pyrogen, Supermen of America
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

Activate >>> Stun Pyrogen. If you do, stun target attacker.
Fight fire with fire.

name: Recruiting Drive
effect:
To play, return a non-stunned character you control to its owner's hand.

Search your deck for up to two Outsiders character cards with combined cost 3 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand.

name: Renee Montoya, Gotham Central
effect: Free >>> Choose a number. Renee Montoya gets +1 ATK this turn for each face-up resource you control with cost equal to that number. Use only once per turn.

name: Roy Harper as Arsenal, Ladies' Man
effect:
Substitute

Leader: Exhaust a character adjacent to Roy Harper >>> Target player loses 1 endurance. Use only during the combat phase.
"There's always time for a bit of gunplay."

name: Satanus, Colin Thornton
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Satanus becomes stunned, you may move target stunned character with cost 2 or less to your front row. (You gain control of it.)

name: Savant, Brian Durlin
effect:
Concealed—Optional, Substitute

Savant gets -3 / +3 while visible.
Savant has everything a girl could want in a man, except a sense of right and wrong.

name: Scarecrow, Fear and Loathing
effect:
When Scarecrow enters play, you may discard a card at random. If you do, return target character with cost 2 or less to its owner's hand.

Insanity: Return target character with cost 3 or less instead.

name: Scorched Earth
effect: Choose a number. If you control an Outsiders character, target player loses 1 endurance for each face-up resource you control with cost equal to that number.

name: Shift, Knockoff
effect: Pay 1 endurance >>> Shift gets +1 / -1 this attack. Then, if his DEF is 0 or less, remove him from this attack. Use only if Shift is in combat.

name: SKREEEEEEE!
effect: Target character gets -2 DEF while defending this turn and can be attacked as though it were visible this turn.

name: Smallville
effect: Protected Team Superman characters you control get +1 / +1 and have range.
Smallville is the perfect place to recharge after saving the day.

name: Soaring to New Heights
effect: Target Team Superman attacker you control gets +3 ATK this attack and also gets +3 DEF if you control Superman.

name: Solaris, Tyrant Sun
effect: Whenever Solaris stuns an attacker or defender, you may stun target character with cost less than or equal to the number of ongoing plot twists you control.
A sentient artificial sun, Solaris is destined to be Superman's greatest enemy.

name: Sondra Fuller as Clayface, Mud Pack
effect: You can recruit Sondra Fuller from your KO'd pile.
The Mud Pack formed with a common purpose: destroy Batman.

name: Soul Slicer
effect:
Play only during your recruit step and only if you control an Outsiders character.

Whenever target character becomes stunned this turn, remove it from the game.

name: Spirit of Nabu, Magic
effect: Ongoing: Pay 2 endurance >>> Target character you control has flight and range this turn. Use only once per turn.
"The Tenth Age of Magic will restore order by rewriting the Laws of Magic."

name: Standoff
effect: Ongoing: Whenever a player plays a non-ongoing plot twist, he loses 2 endurance.
"We're not here to rescue you. We came to take you in."

name: Stryker's Island
effect: Activate >>> Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each different cost among face-up resources you control.
There's no escape.

name: Superman, Bulletproof
effect: Superman can't be stunned.
Why do they keep trying?

name: Superman, Deterrent Force
effect:
Loyalty

Cosmic: Activate >>> Target character can't attack this turn.
You don't even want to try that.

name: Superman, Last Son of Krypton
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

To recruit, pay 4 resource points.

(Superman's cost is not odd; even; or greater than, less than, or equal to any value. You don't lose endurance as he becomes stunned.)

name: Superman, Man of Tomorrow
effect: Superman has invulnerability during your first attack and defense each turn.
You can't hurt him, but you can get his attention.

name: Taking Aim
effect:
To play, discard up to four cards.

Target Gotham Knights attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack for each card you discarded.
Some people say she's too violent. Some people don't understand what's at stake.

name: Taking Out the Trash
effect: Target Outsiders character you control gets +3 ATK while in combat with a character with greater cost this turn.

name: Tally Man, Tax Time
effect: Whenever Tally Man is discarded, you may remove him from the game and exhaust an Arkham Inmates character you control. If you do, KO target stunned character.
"Everybody has to pay the Tally Man."

name: Technocrat, Geoffrey Barron
effect: Whenever Technocrat team attacks, draw a card.
Barron has reaped many dividends from his high-tech armor.

name: Ted Grant as Wildcat, Nine Lives
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +3 / -3 this attack. You may move Ted Grant to your hidden or visible area.
"Let's dance."

name: Terra, Little Sis
effect:
Substitute

Activate >>> Target attacker you control can't be stunned this attack.

name: Terra-Man, Toby Manning
effect: Terra-Man gets +1 / +1 for each ongoing plot twist you control.
Terra-Man utilizes futuristic weapons modeled after those used in the Old West.

name: The Guardian, Jim Harper
effect: A character protected by The Guardian gets +1 / +1 and has range.
Behind the Guardian's shield, Suicide Slum residents feel much braver.

name: The Hook-Up, Team-Up
effect:
To play, choose two different affiliations among characters you control.

Ongoing: Crossover those affiliations.

Discard a Gotham Knights character card >>> Draw a card. Use only once per turn.

name: The Insiders, Team-Up
effect:
Play only if you control an Outsiders character.

Ongoing: Affiliated character cards you own gain the Outsiders affiliation.

name: The Joker as Red Hood, The Man Who Laughs
effect: Whenever The Joker stuns a character, you may discard a card at random. If you do, target opponent loses 3 endurance.
That day, the joke was on him.

name: The Joker, Crazy for You
effect: Insanity: Discard a card at random >>> Target Arkham Inmates character you control gets +1 / +1 this turn.
""When super villains want to scare each other, they tell Joker stories."

name: The Joker, Out of His Mind
effect: Whenever The Joker is discarded, you may remove him from the game. If you do, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw a card for each card you shuffled in.

name: The Newsboy Legion, Army
effect: A character protecting The Newsboy Legion gets +1 / +1.
"Boys, no running near the atomic reactor!"

name: The Penguin, Crime's Early Bird
effect: Whenever The Penguin is discarded, you may remove him from the game. If you do, return an Arkham Inmates character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
The Penguin fancies himself a "gentleman of crime."

name: The Question, Victor Sage
effect: Free >>> Choose a number. The Question gets +1 DEF this turn for each face-up resource you control with cost equal to that number. Use only once per turn.
"It's not just you. I don't trust anyone."

name: The Riddler, Multiple Choice
effect:
Reservist

At the start of your attack step, you may discard a card at random. If you do, exhaust target visible character.
What is it that has four wheels, costs eleven million dollars, and flies?

name: Thunder, Anissa Pierce
effect: Other characters team attacking with Thunder have invulnerability.
Thunder redefines "heavy duty."

name: Thunder, Heavy Duty
effect: Thunder gets +2 ATK while in combat with a character with greater cost.
She's no pushover.

name: Tied Down
effect: Target defender gets -3 ATK this attack and an additional -1 ATK for each other Tied Down in your resource row and KO'd pile.
"If you wanted me all tied up, Batman, you could have just asked nicely."

name: Tim Drake as Robin, Flying Solo
effect:
Substitute

Discard a card >>> Target defender in your support row has reinforcement this attack.
Tim is good at planning ahead and thinking on his feet.

name: Training Day, Team-Up
effect: Ongoing: Free >>> Choose two different affiliations among characters you control. Crossover those affiliations this turn. Use only once per turn.
Even super heroes need to practice.

name: Truth and Justice, Team-Up
effect:
To play, choose two different affiliations among characters you control.

Ongoing: Crossover those affiliations.

Discard another card named Truth and Justice >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control.

name: Two-Face, Heads or Tails
effect: Activate >>> Exhaust target character with cost 4 or less.
"There is the capacity for good and evil in each of us."

name: Two-Face, Jekyll and Hyde
effect: Discard a card >>> If that card's cost is odd, Two-Face gets +2 / +2 this turn. Use only once per turn.
"Heads, I win. Tails, you live."

name: Ultraman, Despot of Kandor
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Cosmic: Characters your opponents control get -1 DEF.
"Defilers! I would have given you paradise!"

name: Usual Suspects
effect: Search your deck for two different Arkham Inmates character cards with the same cost, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Discard two cards at random.
"It was none of 'em, I swear . . . Can I go now? Please?"

name: Vartox, Hero of Tynola
effect: Cosmic: Free >>> Remove target defender you control from this attack, and Vartox becomes a defender. Use only once per turn.
A powerful champion from a destroyed home world . . . sounds familiar.

name: Vixen, Mari Jiwe McCabe
effect:
Concealed—Optional, Substitute

Vixen gets -3 / +3 while visible.
Vixen calls on the abilities of any animal through her totem.

name: White Lotus, Supermen of America
effect: At the start of the combat phase, you may move White Lotus to your hidden or visible area.
You can't take your eyes off her for a second.

name: Winslow Schott as Toyman, Child's Play
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Winslow Schott becomes stunned, you may put target card from a KO'd pile on the top of its owner's deck.

name: Wonder Woman, Deflection Diva
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Wonder Woman defends, you may exhaust her. If you do, remove all defenders from this attack and another target Team Superman character you control becomes a defender.
Even the Man of Steel needs a little help sometimes.

name: World's Worstest, Team-Up
effect:
Play only if you control a Revenge Squad character.

Ongoing: Affiliated character cards gain the Revenge Squad affiliation.
"Here we aren't to fail the day!"

name: Wylde, Charlie Wylde
effect: Whenever Wylde team attacks, target player loses 1 endurance for each attacker.
Sebastian Faust turned Wylde into a were-bear in order to save his life.
